definitions.definition: Something secret or unexplainable; an unknown.
definitions.example: The truth behind the events remains a mystery.

definitions.definition: Someone or something with an obscure or puzzling nature.
A religious truth not understandable by the application of human reason alone (without divine aid).
(chiefly in plural) A secret religious celebration, admission to which was usually through initiation.
A particular event or series of events in the life of Christ.
definitions.example: The second decade of the Rosary concerns the Sorrowful mysteries, such as the crucifixion and the crowning with thorns.

definitions.definition: A craft, art or trade; specifically a guild of craftsmen.
